Precompiled Binaries for windows, macosx and linux.

= Introduction =

It's now possible to checkout Precompiled Binaries from the openmalaria repository.

= Details =
  * _*Windows:*_
  svn checkout 'http://openmalaria.googlecode.com/svn/download/windows_build_784/'
  * _*MACOSX:*_
  svn checkout 'http://openmalaria.googlecode.com/svn/download/apple_build_784/'
  * _*LINUX(X86):*_
  svn checkout 'http://openmalaria.googlecode.com/svn/download/linux_build_784/'
